title: Is BTS’s Jungkook a Christian? - Quora

response.answer_text: The questioner is asking if BTS Jungkook is a christian. According to his solo song, Begin, one particular lyric: ‘’I pray’’ highlight the fact that he isn’t atheist. RM and his collaborators wrote this song. It is highly likely that Jungkook wouldn’t sing a lyrics which he is uncomfortable if he were an atheist. According to the statistical information service the major religion of Koreans are as follows: No affiliation (56.1%) Protestantism (19.7%) Buddhism (15.5%) Catholicism (7.9%) Other (0.8%) The likelihood of Jungkook being a christian is 27.6% Now understand that beliefs and its lack of is personal since it doesn’t relate to Jungkook as an entertainer but 전정국 a young man in his 20s. No one can aspire to know the answer to this question unless Jungkook confirm it himself…  …but he is more interested in eating than revealing his personal life Danel Fentone's answer to What do you do for a living? Do you like it?

I believe that it has been made clear that Jungkook is non religious. I would like to point out that this does not mean he is not Christian. When talking about a religious Christian people are usually actually referring to a Catholic. I myself am Christian and I am non religious. We don't practice any specific rituals. We pray and we may bow in certain moments. I am a fan of showing my belief through jewellery so I often wear bracelets or necklaces with crosses. Jungkook is seen on multiple occasions with one of these two options. Kookie also has been seen bowing and/or making gestures similar to those of famous Christians. On many occasions he will make references to “god.” This of course could be any god so it doesn't mean he is definitely Christian but it definitely sounds like he isn't atheist. Nothing can be 100% until Jungkook confirms it so this is all speculation but if I had to guess I'd say he was a non religious Christian.
